name: Axe of Chances
description:
Axe of Chances is a game about a peaceful little girl who lives in a forest. One day, an evil shape-shifting monster turns into a tree to suck out the forest life force.  Without knowing which tree is the monster, the little girl began to cut the trees with the magical axe. She hopes cutting trees will lead to saving the forest.

Play Time: 1 - 5 minutes.

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys to move.

Spacebar for cutting the trees. 

Axe of Chances is a game under the name of Spacesoda Games, an Independent collaboration studio. Chance of Axe collaborators are Adib Wahono (Adene) and Alya Anggasari (layalay).

Found us on:

Adib Wahono - Twitter/Twitch

Alya Anggasari - Twitter/Instagram/Behance

Spacesoda Games - Instagram/Discord

Acknowledgements:

As this has been our first game jam and our very first making game until it is completed/published. We are very proud that we can participate in this game jam with little knowledge of Unity/C#. We also want to thank you for friends, family, and Game Dev Youtuber. Our games use SoundFVX provided by Freesound and Music by Incompetech

There are a lot of bugs and improvements that can be made. Please comment below if you found any or have suggestions for improvement.
